sentences.en: A backpack full of pebbles returned with me to Holland.
sentences.cn: 等到回荷兰的时候,我背了一大袋的石头.

sentences.en: A backpack is a Viking helmet - neither should be a crowed train.
sentences.cn: 背包像维京海盗的头盔一样,不应该带上拥挤的火车.

sentences.en: A: Can you put this thingie in your backpack?
sentences.cn: 你可以把这小东西放进你背包 吗 ?

sentences.en: He puts his pen, ruler and eraser into his backpack.
sentences.cn: 他把他的钢笔 、 尺子和橡皮擦装进书包里.

sentences.en: He squirmed out of the straps of his backpack.
sentences.cn: 他扭动身体，挣开背包的肩带。

sentences.en: In fact, she wanted to give him to buy a backpack.
sentences.cn: 其实她是想给他买个背包的.

sentences.en: It's time to wear my backpack and go to school.
sentences.cn: 开始背起书包上学堂了.

sentences.en: Joyce Certainly, let me move my backpack under the seat.
sentences.cn: 乔伊斯当然可以.让我移一下座位底下的背包.

sentences.en: Let me take my camera out of my backpack.
sentences.cn: 让我把相机从我的背包里拿出来.

sentences.en: Looking back, she feels she should never have hung up her backpack.
sentences.cn: 回首过去，她觉得自己真不该放下背包不再徒步旅行。

sentences.en: My hiking sticks telescope and can be put into the backpack.
sentences.cn: 我的徒步旅行手杖能伸缩,可以把他放到背包里.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, the scissors in my backpack was taken out at the airport.
sentences.cn: 不幸地, 被机场收起了我放在背包内的剪刀.

sentences.en: Well, he wanted to borrow my backpack to take his basketball home.
sentences.cn: 吁~后来维特想向我借背包好把篮球装回家.

sentences.en: When Ferguson catches Michael and Lincoln they give him the backpack.
sentences.cn: 费格森赶上了迈可和林肯,迈可将背包递给了他.

words.tran_cn: 双肩背包，背包；远足用的背包
